title: and Equality (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2010 (Part 3)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2010 (Part 3) 

(Fixed Charge Offences) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited road traffic act 2010 (part 3) (fixed charge offences) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: and Equality (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on the 1st day of February
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on the 1st day of February
text_norm: 2 regulation shall come operation 1st day february

title: and Equality (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: 5. The Table in Part 2 of Schedule 4 to the Principal Regulations is
text_raw:
5. The Table in Part 2 of Schedule 4 to the Principal Regulations is 

amended – 

(a) 

in the column entitled “Article”, by the insertion of “other than 
paragraphs (2)(i) and (m)” after “36 (as amended by Article 7 of 
the Road Traffic 
(Amendment) 
Regulations 1998 (S.I. No. 274 of 1998))”, 

(Traffic and Parking) 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [747] 3 

(b) 

(c) 

in the column entitled “Article”, by the deletion of “39 (as 
amended by Article 16(p) of the Road Traffic (Traffic and 
Parking) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2012)”, and 
in the column entitled “Description of Contravention”, by the 
deletion of “Parking a vehicle in a bus lane or on a bus only 
street”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 December, 2021. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport.

title: and Equality (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations increase the fixed charge for parking on a footway, a cycle 
track, or a bus lane. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [747] 5
